snippet.title: The Witcher - Cinematic Teaser
snippet.description: Created by Academy Award-nominated director Tomasz Baginski and his Platige Image studio, this video shows off a small portion of The Witcher's intro cinematic, in which Geralt has to spend a night with the ghastly Shtriga, a princess cursed to live as the bloodthirsty beast.
